tasks.task: Ride a riding lawnmower through a field.
subtasks: Sit on the riding lawnmower.
Propel the riding lawnmower forward.
Guide the riding lawnmower through the field.
Steer the riding lawnmower around obstacles or changes in terrain.

tasks.task: Fertilize crops using a riding lawnmower with a fertilizer spreader attachment.
subtasks: Attach a fertilizer spreader to the riding lawnmower.
Operate the fertilizer spreader to release the correct amount of fertilizer.
Drive the riding lawnmower through the rows of crops, distributing fertilizer evenly.
Adjust the speed of the riding lawnmower to maintain proper spreader application.

tasks.task: Mow a grass field.
subtasks: Position the riding lawnmower at the beginning of the grass field.
Start the riding lawnmower engine.
Maneuver the lawnmower to cut the grass, moving in straight lines or overlaps.
Adjust the cutting height of the mower blades as needed.
Turn corners and navigate around obstacles in the field.

tasks.task: Accumulate hay in a field.
subtasks: Drive a four-wheeler or similar vehicle between rows of hay.
Use a tool or method to pile hay into windrows.
Repeat process across the entire field.

tasks.task: Pull hay using a vehicle.
subtasks: Load hay bales onto a truck or trailer attached to a vehicle.
Secure the hay bales to prevent shifting during transport.
Drive the vehicle to transport the hay to a storage location.

tasks.task: Ride a four-wheeler to inspect a field.
subtasks: Sit on a four-wheeler and drive through the field.
Stop periodically to check crop conditions or for other必要的操作。
Note observations or make marks on a map for future reference.

tasks.task: Plant crops using a riding mower with a seed drill attachment.
subtasks: Secure the seed drill attachment to the riding mower.
Load the seed drill with the appropriate seeds.
Operate the seed drill to plant the seeds at the correct depth and spacing.
Drive the riding mower through the prepared field, planting the seeds evenly.
Adjust the seeding rate as needed.

tasks.task: Cut a hay field using a riding mower with a sickle bar mower attachment.
subtasks: Attach a sickle bar mower to the riding mower.
Operate the sickle bar mower to cut the hay at the appropriate height.
Drive the mower through the field, ensuring even coverage.
Avoid damaging the cut hay and transport it to the desired location.

tasks.task: Maintain a riding lawnmower for agronomy use.
subtasks: Inspect the mower for any damages or issues.
Sharpen or replace blades as necessary.
Check and refill fuel, oil, and other fluids.
Lubricate moving parts and tighten loose bolts.

tasks.task: Use a riding mower to apply pesticides to crops.
subtasks: Attach a pesticide applicator to the riding mower.
Check the pesticide applicator settings and application rate.
Operate the applicator and direct the spray pattern as needed.
Drive the riding mower through the crop rows, applying pesticides uniformly.
Follow safety protocols when handling pesticides.

tasks.task: Operate a riding mower to bail hay.
subtasks: Connect a hay baler to the riding mower.
Operate the baler to cut hay and form bales.
Load the bales onto a trailer or stacking them.
Secure bales for transport or storage.

tasks.task: Fertilize soybean fields using a fertilizer spreader.
subtasks: Drive a tractor or similar machine equipped with a fertilizer spreader.
Distribute fertilizer evenly across the field.
Adjust the spreader settings as needed for the crop type.
Repeat the process for multiple passes if necessary.

tasks.task: Mow a bean field using a mowing machine.
subtasks: Position the mowing machine at the start of the bean field.
Start the mowing machine and set the height to match bean height.
Move the machine through the rows, mowing the vegetation.
Check the mowing quality and adjust as needed.
Drive the machine towards the field's end.

tasks.task: Use a riding mower to prepare a field for planting.
subtasks: Clear debris, rocks, or other obstacles from the field.
Grade the field surface to create a smooth planting area.
Compact the soil, if needed, for better seedbed preparation.

tasks.task: Apply post-emergence herbicide using a riding mower.
subtasks: Equip the mower with a herbicide spray system.
Calibration the herbicide rate and application settings.
Drive the mower through the field, applying the herbicide to emerging weeds.

tasks.task: Plant a corn field using a mechanical planter.
subtasks: Set up the planter with corn seed suitable for the field.
Operating the planter to insert seeds at the correct depth and spacing.
Drive the planter through the prepared field, ensuring even coverage.

tasks.task: Harvest a hay field using a mower-conditioner and windrow collector.
subtasks: Attach a mower-conditioner to the tractor.
Mow the hay field to the proper height.
Condition the cut hay to ensure proper curing.
Use a windrow collector to form the hay into windrows.
Repeat the process in different areas of the field, moving equipment as necessary.

tasks.task: Apply pre-emergence herbicide using a fertilizer spreader.
subtasks: Equipping the spreader with herbicide instead of fertilizer.
Distribute the herbicide across the field according to the planned pattern.

Fertilize crops using a riding lawnmower with a fertilizer spreader attachment.
Mow a grass field.
Accumulate hay in a field.
Pull hay using a vehicle.
Ride a four-wheeler to inspect a field.
Plant crops using a riding mower with a seed drill attachment.
Cut a hay field using a riding mower with a sickle bar mower attachment.

Use a riding mower to prepare a field for planting.
